name: @advanced-communities/salesforce-mcp-server
description: MCP server enabling AI assistants to interact with Salesforce orgs through the Salesforce CLI

scripts.build:mcpb: npm run build && mkdir -p dist && npx mcpb pack . dist/salesforce-mcp-server.mcpb
scripts.prepublish:changelog: claude -p --model haiku --allowedTools Bash,Edit,Read,Glob,Grep -- 'Review all git commits since the last version tag (use git log and git diff). Summarize changes into @CHANGELOG.md following the existing format, update the @README.md if needed. Bump the version in package.json, manifest.json, server.json, and src/index.ts.'

author: Advanced Communities
